function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid outflow of capital from emerging countries leading to economic instability and poverty","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases due to poverty and lack of resources","Mitigation":"Stabilizing the economy, providing financial support to affected populations, and implementing social safety nets","Technologies":"Financial monitoring and assistance systems, economic stabilization tools","People":"Populations in emerging countries and poverty-stricken areas","Owner":"Government, international organizations, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Projected job losses and income reduction worldwide","Impact":"Increased poverty and malnutrition, leading to higher susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Creating employment opportunities, income support programs, and social welfare initiatives","Technologies":"Job creation platforms, income support systems","People":"Global workforce, individuals at risk of unemployment","Owner":"Government, private sector, international organizations"},{"Description":"Virus hotspots in urban slums and refugee camps","Impact":"High risk of rapid disease spread and lack of healthcare access","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare access, implementing sanitary measures, and providing medical support to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure, sanitation systems, mobile medical units","People":"Urban slum residents, refugees, displaced individuals","Owner":"Local authorities, international aid organizations"}]}
